lead_paragraph: After doubts were raised by a producer of a documentary on the historic victory, ESPN conceded it might be showing coaches’ or scouts’ film synchronized to a radio call.

headline.main: ESPN Steps Back From Authenticity of 1966 Texas Western Broadcast
headline.print_headline: ESPN Steps Back From Authenticity of Texas Western Broadcast

snippet: After doubts were raised by a producer of a documentary on the historic victory, ESPN conceded it might be showing coaches’ or scouts’ film synchronized to a radio call.
